name: reconfirmation
content:
reconfirmation noun
(MAKING CERTAIN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the act of making an arrangement or meeting certain, often by phone or writing, for the second time or more: The restaurant required re-confirmation one week in advance. I would be surprised if anyone in the industry would say that reconfirmation benefits the traveller.
[ C ] a statement, usually written, that an arrangement or meeting is certain, that is given for the second time or more: We will send you a reconfirmation after we receive your final payment.

(PROVING TRUE)
